1.content:
NAME: Team Shmit
ORIENTATION: Hero
MEMBERS: Mr. Shmit, Satan, Fluffy, Kody, Bloodthorn, Zelda, Tikal


NAME: Team Infinity
ORIENTATION: Hero
MEMBERS: Captain Infinity, Mewtwo, Miles Prower, Vortigon, Dr. Frantic (and the Sitekick) Kagome, Cosmo.


NAME: Team Eternity
ORIENTATION: Dark
MEMBERS: Riku Replica, Shadow the Hedgehog, Chaos 0, Deoxys, Bizaro Frantic (and Dark Sitekick)



NAME:Team Heavy Metal
ORIENTATION: Hero
MEMBERS: Meta Knight, E-102 Gamma, Iron Man, Professor Honeycut, Robot Boy, Edward, Alphonse


NAME: Team Thirteen
ORIENTATION: Dark
MEMBERS: Saximaphone, Dr. Robotnick, Gannondorf, Bowser, Megatron, Danny Figment, Lardious
1.title: Choose Your Team!

choices: Go see what your fellow team mates are doing
Check the Missions computer for any new threats
1113.content: You are now Tails, the Sorcerer of the Elements! You're sixteen, and have Sonic's speed and a strength almost as strong as Knuckles'! You wear jeans, a blue t-shirt with your fox tail design under a black button-up t-shirt, and fingerless gloves matching your shirt's design. Your right ear is pierced with a golden hoop earring, and you wield a sword that's as tall as yourself while being half as wide, yet in your hands it's practically weightless! It's the Sword of the Elements, one of eight magic swords that you and a team of new heroes you led possess. And guess what? Only YOU can wield this special elemental sword! (Don't you feel all special now?!) Anyway, you're hanging out in Team Infinity's base, and you're bored with nothing to do. What do you do?
1113.title: Tails, the elemental hero!

11131.content:
You decide to call Melissa. You only met her a while ago, but you two are already in deep love with each other. Melissa is your age, and she has three tails and golden fur. She wears jeans, a sapphire-blue hoodie, fingerless gloves, and a backwards baseball cap with holes for your ears. She'd stayed behind with your other Sword Sorcerer friends when you went to join the team. You whip out your cell phone, and dial Melissa's cell. "Hello?" She says. Her voice is low, and a little slow, which could mean two things; She was either tired or depressed.
"Melissa? What's wrong?" You ask.
11131.title: Melissa in distress

choices: "This is something I must do myself,"
"Why don't you come with me on the next mission?"
111312.content: "I miss you, it's just not the same without you!" Melissa tells you. "Vincent and Vance and the other villains aren't any trouble, but I'd take on everything the darkness could throw at us, as long as I could be with you!" Now you've got a decision to make to deal with Melissa, so what will you say?
111312.title: Tails' Reply

choices: "Mewtwo, I want you to send Cosmo to the Soul Society..."
1113121.content:
"I'm sorry," you say, and you don't need to say any more. "Your worried about Cosmo aren't you?!"

***
You think back 8 years, when you first joined the team. Captian had been leader, and Mewtwo the seccond in command. Cosmo had been your girlfriend before that, but had been killed. You saught the help of the necromancer Veson to bring her back, and you were happy. But, Cosmo became more and more violent and soon had driven herself to the point of trying to kill you. She fell to her seccond death in Brinstar and, due to her unnatural reserection, turned directly into a Hallow; you fear she may still follow you and try to kill Mellissa out of blind hunger jealousy. Captain quit the team 5 years later to start a new life on earth. Mewtwo despised leading (due to his low self esteem) and left the job to you...

***

After a heated argument with Mellissa, you slam the phone down. Mewtwo, sensing your anger, floats over. His eyes were dull and filled with the wisdom of his old age. "What is troubleing you Miles?" He asks in a gentle manner that was unsettling to those who knew his violent past.
1113121.title: Tail's Flashback

11131212.content:
"Piss off you bastard, it's none of your business!" Mewtwo didn't seem angry at this, as he'd read your mind and knew you were still upset from your fight with Melissa. He also didn't want to upset you any more, as your punishments can be a little harsh when you're angry, though you're still a good leader.
"I know being away from the one you love can be hard, Miles, but we both know this team would be lost without you, I wasn't half of the leader that Captain Infinity was!"
"I suppose you're right," You sigh. "I just wish we weren't so busy with all the threats of the universe so that I could see her more often! And I haven't seen any of my friends since I joined the team, and I can't help but wonder how they're holding up against Vincent without me!" (Vincent is the villain from my fanfiction that this version of Tails is based off of!)
"I'm sure Melissa is doing just as good a job in leading them as you did when you were still with your original team!" Mewtwo replied. "I'll leave you to yourself, I think you should have some time alone!" With that, he teleported out of the room. What happens now?
11131212.title: Mewtwo's Reply

111312121.content: You dial Mel's cell, you get the answering machine "Hello, you've reached Melissa I'm sorry for missing your call, I'll try to get back to you soon" *beep* "Melissa it's Tails, I'm calling to say I'm sorry please forgive me" You say and hang up
111312121.title: Call Melissa back and apologize

choices: See if Frantic needs any help!
11132.content: You walk towards a series of rooms. The only people home, other than yourself, are Dr. Frantic and Vortigon. You never got along much with Vortigon, but your bored, and decide that bugging him would be fun. Despite him being 10 years older, Vortigon isn't any smarter. Then again, there are odd noises coming from Frantic's room (Which is normal by his standards). He might need help with his new Sitekick chip, or whatever the hell he's working on. You decide to...
11132.title: Who do you want to talk to today?

115.content: Who else would you want to be?
115.title: The Rest of the Team

12.content: Who will you be playing as?
12.title: what is your perspective?

121.content:
"DARK FIRAGA!" You yell, casting a purple ball of flame at Chaos. As soon as the flame hit him, however, it was imediately turned to steam.
"Idiot..." Shadow said bluntly. "You rush into fights without thinking. It's a wonder that you're still alive..."
"SHUT UP! I don't need you to tell me what to do!"
"I'm team leader."
"Only because my pink anthro sister is in love with you!"
"As insane as Rose may be, it dosn't change anything. You will listen to me, or I'll set you up on a 'play-date ' with Rose."
"D-don't even joke about that!"
"Then shut your mouth and follow orders." Shadow said slyly.
121.title: Replica and Shadow's argument

choices: You decide to fight Riku yourself.
You stay and watch Riku humiliate himself.
122.content:
"DARK FIRAGA!" Yelled Riku Replica, casting a purple ball of flame at Chaos. As soon as the flame hit him, however, it was imediately turned to steam.
"Idiot..." You say bluntly. "You rush into fights without thinking. It's a wonder that you're still alive..."
"SHUT UP! I don't need you to tell me what to do!"
"I'm team leader."
"Only because my pink anthro sister is in love with you!"
You shudder.
"As insane as Rose may be, it dosn't change anything. You will listen to me, or I'll set you up on a 'play-date ' with Rose."
"D-don't even joke about that!"
"Then shut your mouth and follow orders." You say, slyly
122.title: Shadow and Riku's Argument

15.content:
Mr. Shmit sat bored in the green medow. He yawned and stretched. There was very little to do. "I wonder what I could do.." he ponderd, adjusting his hat.

What could he do?
Each should have a shocking twist!
15.title: Meet Shmit

choices: lay on the floor with paper bags over there heads and wait for the worst
153.content: "I think I'll have a nap, right next to this really old tower that for some reason I can't remember what it's for." After a few minutes he awoke from the door of the tower creaking open. "mnmh" grumped Mr. Shmit, "Darn the person who woke me up." He quickly went through the door after the person. At the top of the tower, a shadowy figure was standing over 3 gems, the Hyper Stones. The figure heard Mr. Shmit enter the door. "Ha, thats over 20 stories, I've got loads of time," he mumbled to himself. "Stop... you... fiend... Darn... need... water." There behind him was Mr. Shmit, panting from the run up the steps. "Ha, you're too late," the figure pushed in a stone on the basin that held the stones. The stones shot up out of the building in the different directions. "So long Mr. Shmit. That was compliments from Team Infinity," and with that he flew through the hole and escaped. Fluffy, Satan, and Kody came up the steps just after. "Oh no, do you know what this means," Fluffy said, pointing at the missing stones. "Uh... We're about to be in financial trouble?" asked Satan. "No, those stones are what make Kody become evil and faster." said Mr. Shmit. "Well... there is an easy way to end this story without that much harm. We could give Kody a death out of viewers' eyes." "Yesbutthatwouldcutthestoryshortandlooseratings." said Kody. "So just because of a single nap we have to go save the world!" exclaimed Mr. Shmit. all of a sudden a random Chinese guy boated down the river and spoke," What a twist!"
153.title: A nap- what could go wrong.

info.description:
Anything goes, I will change the rating and edit chapters where necessary.

Keep character personalities constant.

Have fun

Custom characters are welcome, but give good descriptions!
